title: Capacitors - E and U with smaller d and constant Q

content.description: A parallel plate capacitor consists of two plates separated by a distance <math alttext="d" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>d</mi></math>. The capacitor is connected to a battery so that there is a potential difference <math alttext="delta V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Î”</mi><mi>V</mi></math> between the plates. The capacitor is then disconnected from the battery and isolated. While the capacitor is disconnected, the plates are moved together until they are a distance <math alttext="d over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> apart.
